text: Valambray is a commune. It is found in the region Normandy in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2017 and consists of the former communes of Airan (the seat), Billy, Conteville, Fierville-Bray and Poussy-la-Campagne.Arrêté préfectoral 8 September 2016 == References == Category:2017 establishments in France Category:Communes in Calvados
title: Valambray
